name: Yard Guard
description:
Defend the garden while your mom is away.

Srayan Jana (@ValorZardK) - did some 3D models for the weapons, as well as helping out with level design.

Alice —  Narrative portion, which includes the awesome 2D art, cutscene intro and end-game screens!

Branden Ulloa: gameplay implementation, level design

Brigitte Giles: Modeled and textured enemies and the house, textured weapons, found tree assets, and helped come up with the cabin by the forest level layout/idea

Mindy Jun:  swapping weapons, damaging enemies, countdown and other gameplay stuff

Made in a 10 week period by: Alice Hua, Branden Ulloa, Brigitte Giles, Mindy Jun, Srayan Jana
